text: Five R5 clade C transmitted / founder Env pseudotyped strains were constructed as described [ 71 , 72 ] . Briefly , rev - vpu - env cassettes from the transmitted founder strains were cloned into pcDNA 3 . 1D / V5 - HIS TOPOH expression vector . The pseudotyped viruses were then produced by co - transfecting 293T cells with pcDNA 3 . 1 ( rev - vpu - env ) , pNL4 - 3 . lucR - E - , and fugene 6 ( Roche ) .
